subsection.name: Project Structure
subsection.p: Groovy projects are structured based on the Maven standard, notably adding a /groovy sub-directory to the /src/main and src/test folders.
subsection.pre: maven-project/ +- pom.xml +- src/ +- main/ | +- java/ | +- groovy/ | +- Example.groovy | +- resources/ +- test/ +- java/ +- groovy/ +- resources/
